meanings.definition: A group of states or countries that are united for a common purpose
meanings.sent1: The confederacy of nations worked together to promote peace.
meanings.sent2: The confederacy of states formed a strong alliance for trade agreements.
meanings.sent3: The confederacy of friends joined forces to organize a charity event.
meanings.sent4: The confederacy of ants collaborated to build an impressive anthill.
meanings.sent5: The confederacy of students banded together to protest against unfair rules.

meanings.definition: A league or alliance, especially of political parties or factions
meanings.sent1: The confederacy of parties agreed to support each other in the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: The confederacy of factions worked together to pass new legislation.
meanings.sent3: The confederacy of teams joined forces to win the championship.
meanings.sent4: The confederacy of animals formed a strong alliance to protect their territory.
meanings.sent5: The confederacy of superheroes united to defeat the villain and save the city.

meanings.definition: A group of people or organizations united in a common cause
meanings.sent1: The confederacy of volunteers helped rebuild the community after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The confederacy of organizations raised funds for a local charity.
meanings.sent3: The confederacy of fans cheered together at the sports event.
meanings.sent4: The confederacy of artists collaborated on a beautiful mural in the park.
meanings.sent5: The confederacy of neighbors worked together to clean up the park.
